org.micromanager

Interface IntroPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MMGenericPlugin, MMPlugin, org.scijava.plugin.SciJavaPlugin

    public interface IntroPlugin
extends MMPlugin
    IntroPlugins are used to customize the intro dialog that prompts the user for which config file and profile to use. Only one IntroPlugin can be effectively used at a time; the program will use whichever one was loaded first.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getConfigFilePaths()
      Provide a list of paths to config files to include in the config file dropdown menu.
      javax.swing.Icon getSplashImage()
      Provide a "splash" image to display at the top of the intro dialog.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.micromanager.MMPlugin

        getCopyright, getHelpText, getName, getVersion, setContext

    • Method Detail

      • getSplashImage

        javax.swing.Icon getSplashImage()
        Provide a "splash" image to display at the top of the intro dialog. If this method returns null, then the default Micro-Manager logo will be used.
        Returns:
        The image to use at the top of the intro dialog, or null.

      • getConfigFilePaths

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getConfigFilePaths()
        Provide a list of paths to config files to include in the config file dropdown menu. These will be provided in addition to any config files the user has used in the past. This list may be null or empty.
        Returns:
        List of config files to show to the user, or null.
